meanings.definition: Scatter or spread (things) untidily over a surface or area.
meanings.sent1: She strews flowers along the path in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The wind strews leaves across the yard in autumn.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel strews acorns all over the picnic blanket.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter strews joy wherever she goes.
meanings.sent5: The artist strews colors on the canvas, creating a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: Cover (a surface or area) with untidily scattered things.
meanings.sent1: He strews papers all over his desk, making it hard to find anything.
meanings.sent2: The kids strew toys around the living room after playing.
meanings.sent3: The magician strews glitter on the stage, adding a touch of magic.
meanings.sent4: The storm strews debris across the road, blocking the way.
meanings.sent5: The chef strews herbs on the dish, enhancing its flavor.
